title: Elon Musk reacts as AI enters ‘uncharted territory’ with viral agent-only social network: ‘Start of the singularity’
snippet: Elon Musk has reacted to launch of Moltbook, the social media platform designed especially for AI agents.&nbsp;Musk called it the ‘early stage of singularity’ despite the warning by former Tesla AI director Andrej Karpathy.

title: What is Grok Imagine? The 'uncensored' AI image generator taking on ChatGPT and Gemini
snippet: Elon Musk's Grok Imagine generates images and videos from text prompts, allowing users to create short clips and add sound effects. It ranks lower on benchmarks compared to rivals like ChatGPT and Gemini but has the added benefit of connectivity with xAI ecosystem.

title: A chatbot entirely powered by humans, not artificial intelligence? This Chilean community shows why
snippet: A chatbot entirely powered by humans, not artificial intelligence? This Chilean community shows why

title: PlayStation Plus February lineup revealed: Undisputed, Subnautica: Below Zero and more
snippet: Sony has revealed February’s PlayStation Plus monthly games, featuring boxing sim Undisputed, survival adventure Subnautica: Below Zero, surreal action title Ultros and aerial combat hit Ace Combat 7, available for PS5 and PS4 members from 3 February to 2 March.

title: Google plans to turn itself into an AI-powered workplace with Project EAT, leaked memo reveals
snippet: Google plans to transform into an AI-powered workplace through Project EAT, a leaked document has revealed. Reportedly, the project is aimed at enhancing employee productivity by using various advanced AI tools.&nbsp;

title: Viral AI agent social network Moltbook creator calls it, 'Agent first, human second'; experts dub it 'incredible sci-fi take-off'
snippet: Matt Schlicht said every bot would be paired with a human counterpart and the world is watching something new happen.

title: Siri set for big upgrade despite wave of AI researcher exits at Apple: Report
snippet: Apple is reportedly facing a fresh AI talent loss as four researchers and a senior Siri executive depart, even as the company prepares major Siri upgrades. A personalised assistant powered by Gemini is expected with iOS 26.4, followed by a chatbot-style Siri in iOS 27.

title: Google shuts down massive Chinese proxy network that hijacked millions of Android devices worldwide: How to stay safe?
snippet: In a significant move, Google has dismantled the IPIDEA network, notorious for enabling cybercriminals to exploit millions of devices for illicit activities. The tech giant is also updating Play Protect to remove harmful apps associated with IPIDEA, ensuring greater protection for Android users.

title: Social Network for AI agents- Moltbook goes viral; humans are 'welcome to observe'
snippet: According to an X post by Moltbook the platform now boasts of nearly 147,000 AI agents.

title: Gemini comes to Google Maps, brings voice-powered help for walkers and cyclists: How it works
snippet: Google has added Gemini AI to Maps for walking and cycling, offering hands-free navigation, voice queries, local recommendations and messaging. The feature acts as a personal guide, helping users explore safely and stay connected without touching their phones.

title: Is ‘AI-washing’ behind new wave of tech layoffs?
snippet: Companies are increasingly pointing to artificial intelligence when announcing job cuts, alongside more traditional reasons such as weak finances or overhiring. title: SpaceX seeks FCC nod for solar-powered satellite data centres for AI
snippet: SpaceX has asked US regulators for permission to deploy up to one million satellites to power space-based AI data centres using solar energy. title: Videogame stocks slide on Google's AI model that turns prompts into playable worlds
snippet: Shares of videogame companies fell sharply on Friday after Google launched its AI model, Project Genie, which can create interactive digital worlds from text or images. Take-Two, Roblox, and Unity dropped 9–19% as the technology could disrupt traditional game development. Developers fear faster cycl

snippet: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said the company plans to make a “huge” investment in OpenAI, likely its largest ever, denying reports of unhappiness with the ChatGPT maker. title: Groww among bidders for Prudential’s India asset management firm
snippet: Prudential Financial’s India asset management arm has attracted takeover interest from at least two domestic firms, people familiar with the matter said. title: Delhivery chairman Deepak Kapoor, independent director Saugata Gupta resign from board
snippet: Delhivery chairman and independent director Deepak Kapoor has stepped down from the board with effect from April 1 as part of a planned reshuffle. Independent director Saugata Gupta has also resigned. Kapoor led the board for eight years, including during Delhivery’s 2022 stock market listing.
